text:
An Accident in the Night

A crowd gathers around a carriage, tense atmosphere.  
“Good Lord, what a misfortune!”  

Coachman: “What more could I do?”  
Coachman: “I shouted three times!”  
Raskolnikov: “What happened here?”  

---  

On the ground, a man lies unconscious, bloodied.  
“Merciful heaven!”  

Coachman: “I was going quietly!”  
Coachman: “A drunken man can’t walk straight!”  
Raskolnikov: “He needs help!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A crowd gathers around a carriage accident where a man lies badly injured and bleeding on the ground.
